alert.note: Alert for Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 2:34AM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches above 6000 feet MSL with up to 3 inches in the valleys below. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph particularly in the Albion Mountains and South Hills. * WHERE...Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, Holbrook, Inkom, McCammon, Downey, and Lava Hot Springs. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
